document_data.name: St. Amahl
document_data.mainbody:
'''St. Amahl''' was a [[saint]] of the [[god]] [[Ilmater]]. He was the Ilmatari saint of nomads, especially those who wandered the desert.

The [[Friary of St. Amahl]] was a caravanserai-turned-monastery in the [[Calim Desert]] of [[Calimshan]], named for St. Amahl. The monks believed their well would never run dry "while St. Amahl watches over us."<ref>
